item.title: About
item.description: I enjoy robotics ! I am researching on humanoid robot at JSK Robotics Laboratry. Education Currentry researching as master student in Graduate School of Information Science and Technology, University of Tokyo(04/2020-) B.S.M.E, University of Tokyo(04/2016 ~) Department of Mechano Infomatics, Faculty of Engineering (04/2018 ~ 03/2020) Faculty of Liberal Arts(04/2016 ~ 03/2018) Azabu High School (~ 03/2016) International Exchage Program, Y.F.S, Ohio, US (09/2013 ~ 06/2014) Publications Y.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Learning of Tool Force Adjustment Skills by a Life-sized Humanoid using Deep Reinforcement Learning and Active Teaching Request Abstract— The purpose of this study is to make life-sized humanoid robots acquire tool manipulation skills that require complicated force adjustment. The difficulty in acquisition of tool manipulation skills comes from the hardship in physical modeling. Recent research has revealed that deep reinforcement learning (DRL), a model-free approach, performs superior in such tasks.
